title: How to Verify a Solution
text: If a point is a solution to a system, then it satisfies both equations.

title: Plugging in the Point
text: Let us plug in the point. $$\left(-3\right) \left(-5\right)+7=-8$$. The first equation is not satisfied, so the point is not a solution. -(-5)F+2(-7)=-9, $$-9=-9$$. The second equation is satisfied. The point is a solution.
